    CoupledFields.GaussianKP — Type.
    GaussianKP: For the gaussian kernel
    CoupledFields.GaussianKernel
    CoupledFields.InputSpace — Type.
    InputSpace: A type to hold the `X` and `Y` fields of the Input space

    InputSpace(X, Y, d, lat): The fields are whitened if d=[d1, d2] is supplied. Area weighting is applied if lat is supplied. 

    CoupledFields.Kernel
    CoupledFields.KernelParameters — Type.
    KernelParameters: An abstract type.

    All KernelParameters types contain certain parameters which are later passed to internal functions Kf and ∇Kf.

    A KernelParameters type is set using e.g. PolynomialKP(X::Matrix{Float64}) or GaussianKP(X::Matrix{Float64}). 

    CoupledFields.Kf
    CoupledFields.LaplacianKernel
    CoupledFields.LinearKernel
    CoupledFields.ModelObj — Type.
    ModelObj: A type to hold statistical model results

    Such as the matrices W, R, A, T, where R=XW and T=YA.

    CoupledFields.PolynomialKP — Type.

    CoupledFields.whiten — Function.
    whiten(x::Matrix{Float64}, d::Float64; lat=nothing): Whiten matrix

    d (0-1) Percentage variance of components to retain.

    lat Latitudinal area-weighting.
